channel.title: Help with runing server java
channel.description:
Ok :confused:, when i click runserver.bat it says " 'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. I already have the latest java download. Also it says that " The Sysetm cannot find the path specified."
Thanks for help!
Also, how do i find out what java i have?

item.title: Help with runing server java
item.dc:creator: @Doogie Doogie
item.description:
@Doogie wrote:

Ive done that, some one was telling me how to do that befor, but i have dled so many dif javas i cant tell one from another…=(

Read full topic

item.title: Help with runing server java
item.dc:creator: @steveolicious steveolicious
item.description:
@steveolicious wrote:

[quote=“Doogie, post:1, topic:222738”]Ok , when i click runserver.bat it says " ‘java’ is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. I already have the latest java download. Also it says that " The Sysetm cannot find the path specified."

Thanks for help![/quote]I think you need to set your environmental values. Check out “How to make a server” in the tutorial section.

Read full topic
